gml:Dictionary.gml:description: The type of a designation for a location instance in a gazetteer.
gml:Dictionary.gml:name: DoD/IC Dictionary: GSIP Geographic Identifier Designation Type Code Dictionary

gml:Definition.gml:description: Lands owned or administered by the U.S. Federal government, for example: national parks, national wildlife refuges, military reservations, Federal prisons, and public-domain land.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Administered Federal

gml:Definition.gml:description: A geographic feature that once existed but has ceased to exist, is no longer discernable on the landscape or seascape, and/or no longer serves the original purpose.
gml:Definition.gml:name: Historical
